@id.title: Handle
@id.description: The unique identifier of the Taxonomic Service object

@type.title: Object Type
@type.description: The type of the object, in this case taxonomicService

cetaf:created.title: Created
cetaf:created.description: The timestamp that the object version was created

dcterms:modified.title: Modified
dcterms:modified.description: Modification date for Taxonomic Service information

cetaf:state.title: State
cetaf:state.description: The state of the taxonomic servive, being draft or published

cetaf:taxonomicServiceType.title: Taxonomic Service Type
cetaf:taxonomicServiceType.description: A type that defines the kind of taxonomic service

dcterms:licence.title: Licence
dcterms:licence.description: A legal document giving official permission to do something with the resource

erp:name.title: Name
erp:name.description: Brief and descriptive name of the Resource as assigned by the Provider

erp:description.title: Description
erp:description.description: A high-level description in fairly non-technical terms of a) what the Resource does, functionality it provides and Resources it enables to access, b) the benefit to a user/customer delivered by a Resource; benefits are usually related to alleviating pains (e.g., eliminate undesired outcomes, obstacles or risks) or producing gains (e.g. increased performance, social gains, positive emotions or cost saving), c) list of customers, communities, users, etc. using the Resource.

erp:tagLine.title: Tag Line
erp:tagLine.description: Short catchphrase for marketing and advertising purposes. It will be usually displayed close to the Resource name and should refer to the main value or purpose of the Resource.

erp:languageAvailabilities.title: Languages supported
erp:languageAvailabilities.description: Indicators for the language the service is written in, using ISO alpha-3/ISO 639-2

erp:logo.title: Logo URL
erp:logo.description: Short catchphrase for marketing and advertising purposes. It will be usually displayed close to the Resource name and should refer to the main value or purpose of the Resource.

erp:category.title: Category
erp:category.description: A named group of Resources that offer access to the same type of Resources.

erp:EOSC_serviceId.title: EOSC Service ID
erp:EOSC_serviceId.description: A persistent identifier, a unique reference to the (Multi-Provider Regional or Thematic) Catalogue in the context of the EOSC Portal.

erp:version.title: Version of taxonomic service
erp:version.description: Version of the Resource that is in force in EOSC.

erp:lastUpdate.title: Last updated
erp:lastUpdate.description: Date of the latest update of the Resource in EOSC.

cetaf:taxonomicScope.title: Taxonomic Scope
cetaf:taxonomicScope.description: The taxonomic scope on which the service acts upon, e.g. the taxonomic level (genus, species, etc.)

cetaf:qualityScore.title: Quality Score
cetaf:qualityScore.description: A quality indicator for the purpose of the service

cetaf:reviewComment.title: Review Comments
cetaf:reviewComment.description: Comments that describes the admin review and why a certain state is given

erp:helpdeskEmail.title: Helpdesk Email
erp:helpdeskEmail.description: Email to contact your helpdesk, where users with incidents and requests will be directed.

erp:helpdeskPage.title: Helpdesk Page
erp:helpdeskPage.description: Link to the helpdesk where users with incidents and requests will be directed. It should allow private communication with providers (not a public forum). Create a dedicated URL for your Resources and provide the shortest possible alias.

cetaf:hasAgent.title: Agents
cetaf:hasAgent.description: Contains zero or more cetaf:Agent objects

cetaf:agentID.title: Agent ID
cetaf:agentID.description: A unique identifier to identify the agent; ORCID or Wikidata identifiers are valid

cetaf:role.title: Role
cetaf:role.description: The role assigned to the agent

erp:webPage.title: Web Page
erp:webPage.description: Webpage with information about the Resource usually hosted and maintained by the Provider.

cetaf:documentationUrl.title: Documentation URL
cetaf:documentationUrl.description: Link to the documentation of the service

erp:paymentModel.title: Paymeny Model
erp:paymentModel.description: Webpage with the supported payment models and restrictions that apply to the Resource.

erp:termsOfUse.title: Terms Of Use
erp:termsOfUse.description: Link describing the rules, resource conditions and usage policy which one must agree to abide by in order to use the Resource. Create a dedicated URL for your Resources and provide the shortest possible alias.

erp:fundingProgram.title: Funding Program
erp:fundingProgram.description: Name of the funding program that supported the development and/or operation of the Resource.

cetaf:sourceUrl.title: Source URL
cetaf:sourceUrl.description: Link pointing to the source URL of the software, e.g. the GitHub repository

erp:requiredResources.title: Required Resources
erp:requiredResources.description: List any other EOSC Resources that your Resource requires in order to operate.

cetaf:deprecated.title: Deprecated
cetaf:deprecated.description: Boolean indicating if the software has been deprecated

erp:changeLog.title: Change Log
erp:changeLog.description: Summary of the Resource features updated from the previous version.

cetaf:programmingLanguages.title: Programming Languages
cetaf:programmingLanguages.description: List of programming lanugages used in the software

cetaf:hasMultimedia.title: Multimedia
cetaf:hasMultimedia.description: Contains zero or more cetaf:Multimedia objects

erp:multimediaUrl.title: Multimedia URL
erp:multimediaUrl.description: Link to video, screenshots or slides showing details of the Resource.
